div.ab: This is a good water for the eyes when one has a mark in them, for red in the eyes, and to clear the eyes: Take a bushel of rose water and as much white wine that is good, and take tutziah parparata and each(???) needs about three fourths from the ounce and alum rigalisa(???), as much as a half-egg, and after that take one dramma [of] cinnabar(?) and crush the cinnabar(?) apart/separately(???) and after that take the same powder and put it very slowly in in the same water, and mix it very fully and put some of it(???) in the eye. So will he be healed, certainly.
Take one turd from a man, and burn it to a powder, and the same powder, it will heal all problems(?) and aching of [the] eyes, certainly.
